text:
A 25-year-old man was found dead under mysterious circumstances near Pernambut on Friday.

Police said Tamilvanan, a resident of Ongkuppam village, Pernambut, was found dead with injuries amid bushes in Kuttai area on Friday morning.

Pernambut police personnel rushed to the spot and sent the body for post mortem. They have registered a case of suspicious death and are investigating into the case. - Staff Reporter
title: Man found dead near Pernambut
